analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0x7c67f847197dad7a2fa14dc8616feb2c920debcc.sol:
	Contract FixedSupplyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0x7c67f847197dad7a2fa14dc8616feb2c920debcc.sol#203-204)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0x7c67f847197dad7a2fa14dc8616feb2c920debcc.sol#71-72) is not in mixedCase
